<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1beta/registry/{name}/servers"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get a list of servers in a specific registry

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Registry name","in":"path","name":"name","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
